detail_description: Tacofino, a renowned food truck in Tofino, gained popularity since its establishment in 2009. Located at the back of the Live To Surf Parking Lot, this vibrant orange truck continues to attract both locals and tourists. Offering an array of mouth-watering tacos, burritos, and gringas (with vegan and vegetarian options available), Tacofino is a must-visit destination. Some menu favorites include the Tuna Ta Taco, Fish Taco, and Krispy Chicken Taco.
name: Tacofino
address: 1184 Pacific Rim Hwy, Tofino, BC V0R 2Z0, Canada

excerpt: Small, comfy standby with a patio showcasing local seafood with Indonesian & French flair.
detail_description: Fishhook is a cozy restaurant that offers a blend of Indian and French flavors, featuring locally sourced seafood. The menu includes shareable plates like the signature Fishhook Poutine and delectable tartines with fresh ingredients such as seared tuna and salmon belly. This spot is perfect for those seeking comforting and delicious food on cold, wet days. With options for dairy-free, wheat-free, and mayo-free dishes, Fishhook caters to various dietary preferences.
name: Fishhook
address: 805 Fort St, Victoria, BC V8W 1H6, Canada

detail_description: Shirley Delicious is a charming cafe located 11 miles west of Sooke, offering a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The cafe prides itself on serving homemade, organic dishes such as quiche, corn fritters, and various gluten-free and vegan treats. Situated in the picturesque town of Shirley along the scenic West Coast Road, visitors can enjoy breathtaking views of the Strait of Juan de Fuca. Despite its small size, Shirley is known for its charm and beauty.
name: Shirley Delicious
address: 2794 Sheringham Point Rd, Shirley, BC V9Z 1G4, Canada

excerpt: Upscale bar/eatery with water views & warm decor serving farm-fresh Canadian dishes & Sunday brunch.
detail_description: The Pointe Restaurant is an elegant bar and eatery in Tofino, Canada, offering beautiful water views and warm decor. It has been serving farm-fresh Canadian dishes for 15 years. The restaurant is known for its gourmet focus and is located at the Wickaninnish Inn, a luxurious hotel overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Guests can enjoy dishes like local cod with romesco crumble or aged organic ribeye with mashed Yukon Gold potatoes.
name: The Pointe Restaurant
address: 500 Osprey Ln, Tofino, BC V0R 3A0, Canada

excerpt: Casual fixture in a strip mall with creative sushi rolls, seasonal Japanese dishes & top-shelf sake.
detail_description: Nori Japanese Restaurant is a laid-back spot located in a strip mall, offering an array of innovative sushi rolls, seasonal Japanese specialties, and premium sake. The restaurant prides itself on using the freshest ingredients and meticulous attention to detail in every dish, resulting in classic Japanese flavors with impeccable presentation. Visitors rave about the top-notch quality of the dishes, making it a must-visit for those seeking authentic and delicious Japanese cuisine.
name: Nori Japanese Restaurant
address: 6750 N Island Hwy, Nanaimo, BC V9V 1S3, Canada

excerpt: Dockside seafood restaurant known for its creative, hand-roll-style tacos. Open seasonally.
detail_description: Red Fish Blue Fish is a seasonal dockside seafood restaurant in Victoria, BC, known for its creative hand-roll-style tacos and modern take on traditional seafood dishes. The restaurant has gained acclaim and popularity, being featured in media outlets like the Lonely Planet Guide, the Today Show, and Food Network Canada's Eat Street. As an Ocean Wise partner, Red Fish Blue Fish showcases sustainably sourced seafood with a menu that offers a fresh twist on quintessential seafood recipes.
name: Red Fish Blue Fish
address: 1006 Wharf St, Victoria, BC V8W 1N8, Canada

excerpt: Rustic eatery styled like a log cabin prepares a variety of steaks, chops & seafood dishes.
detail_description: Kalvas the Log House is a rustic eatery in Parksville, offering a variety of steaks, chops, and seafood dishes. The restaurant's warm wooden interior and welcoming staff create a cozy atmosphere for diners. With its focus on customer satisfaction, the attentive servers are flexible to accommodate different preferences. The semi-circular building provides almost every table with a view from large windows, adding to the upscale dining experience.
name: Kalvas the Log House
address: 180 Moilliet St, Parksville, BC V9P 2J9, Canada

detail_description: Treetop Tapas & Grill is a unique dining experience located within the Grotto Spa at Tigh-Na-Mara Resort in Parksville. The restaurant, situated high in the trees on the spa's third floor, offers a tapas menu designed to be enjoyed in your spa robe after a rejuvenating treatment. Executive Chef Eric Edwards curates small plates that showcase local ingredients such as fresh seafood and artisan cheeses.
name: Treetop Tapas & Grill
address: 1155 Resort Dr, Parksville, BC V9P 2E3, Canada

excerpt: Local, seasonal cuisine in a shingled house with wood floors & exposed beams, plus a covered patio.
detail_description: Nestled in a charming shingled house with wood floors and exposed beams, Locals Restaurant offers a delightful dining experience. The restaurant features local and seasonal cuisine, creating a menu that reflects the best of the region's flavors. Guests can enjoy their meals in the cozy interior or on the covered patio, adding to the inviting atmosphere. With its focus on fresh ingredients and warm ambiance, Locals Restaurant is a must-visit for those seeking an authentic taste of the area.
name: Locals Restaurant
address: 1760 Riverside Ln, Courtenay, BC V9N 8C7, Canada

excerpt: Elevated global fare & cocktails are the draw at this chic outpost with patio seating & water views.
detail_description: Glo is a chic and modern restaurant with stunning views of the Selkirk Waterway. The food is excellent and the patio is great for relaxing in summer.
name: Glo Restaurant + Lounge
address: 2940 Jutland Rd, Victoria, BC V8T 5K6, Canada

excerpt: Comfy, refined eatery from 1949 turning out steak & seafood, plus unique cocktails & local beers.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of downtown Tofino, The Schooner Restaurant has been a beloved dining establishment since 1949. This charming eatery offers a cozy yet refined atmosphere, perfect for both intimate dinners and lively gatherings with friends. Renowned for its delectable steak and seafood dishes, The Schooner frequently updates its menu to showcase fresh local ingredients.
name: The Schooner Restaurant
address: 331 Campbell St, Tofino, BC V0R 2Z0, Canada

excerpt: Modern, upscale resort steakhouse with big windows & a patio overlooking beach & mountain scenery.
detail_description: Nestled within the stunning Beach Club Resort, Pacific Prime Restaurant offers a modern and upscale dining experience that beautifully merges high-end cuisine with the laid-back charm of beachfront life. With expansive windows and a lovely patio that showcases breathtaking views of both the beach and mountains, this restaurant is perfect for those looking to indulge in delicious meals while soaking up nature's beauty. At Pacific Prime, guests can savor an array of dishes crafted from fresh, locally sourced ingredients.
name: Pacific Prime Restaurant at The Beach Club Resort
address: 181 Beachside Dr, Parksville, BC V9P 2H5, Canada

excerpt: Celebrated brasserie for French fare & wine served in bustling, unpretentious quarters.
detail_description: Brasserie L'Ecole is a celebrated French-style bistro located in a bustling and unpretentious setting. The restaurant offers simple, hearty cuisine paired with an excellent selection of wine and beer. The menu features a constantly changing array of dishes that capture the essence of seasonal highlights, showcasing rich and flavorsome French country cooking. The historic ambiance of the restaurant, once a schoolhouse for the Chinese community, adds to its timeless charm.
name: Brasserie L'Ecole
address: 1715 Government St, Victoria, BC V8W 1Z4, Canada

excerpt: Pasta dishes & other Italian staples served at this stalwart eatery with kitschy decor & live music.
detail_description: Pagliacci's is a lively and popular Italian restaurant that has been serving up delicious pasta dishes and other Italian classics since 1979. The restaurant boasts a fun and energetic atmosphere with live music several nights a week, adding to the bustling ambiance. The menu features a variety of options, from traditional veal dishes to fresh, handmade pastas and gluten-free rice bowls. Despite the crowded setting, diners can expect an enjoyable dining experience without breaking the bank.
name: Pagliacci's
address: 1011 Broad St, Victoria, BC V8W 2A1, Canada

excerpt: Contemporary timber house with a patio serving elevated bistro fare sourced from local purveyors.
detail_description: Shelter Restaurant is a modern wooden house with a charming outdoor patio that offers elevated bistro cuisine made from local ingredients. Regardless of the weather in Tofino, this bustling restaurant ensures all your needs are met. Their menu features a variety of dishes ranging from seafood delicacies to more casual options.
name: Shelter Restaurant
address: 634 Campbell St, Tofino, BC V0R 2Z0, Canada

excerpt: Relaxed eatery offering classic surf 'n' turf & other seafood mains, with cocktails & harbour views.
detail_description: Blue Crab Seafood House is a renowned dining spot in Victoria, highly praised for its delectable seafood dishes and classic surf 'n' turf options. The restaurant takes advantage of seasonal ingredients to craft an enticing menu that changes throughout the year. It offers a cozy indoor dining area with a romantic color scheme and a stunning outdoor terrace providing mesmerizing harbor views, making it an ideal choice for a memorable date night.
name: Blue Crab Seafood House
address: 146 Kingston St, Victoria, BC V8V 1V4, Canada

excerpt: All-day breakfast, including eggs Benedict & pancakes, plus updated comfort food amid rustic decor.
detail_description: Jam Cafe is a family-run restaurant with locations in Victoria and Vancouver, offering all-day breakfast and lunch in a cozy, rustic setting. The menu features a mix of classic comfort food and innovative dishes inspired by Southern recipes, such as house-made cornbread, buttermilk biscuits, and fried chicken. With its collection of family-style recipes passed down through generations, Jam Cafe provides a unique and eclectic dining experience that caters to diverse appetites.
name: Jam Cafe
address: 542 Herald St, Victoria, BC V8W 1S5, Canada

excerpt: Popular taverna serving classic Greek plates such as moussaka, seafood & lamb, with global wines.
detail_description: Asteras is a popular Greek taverna located in the heart of Nanaimo, known for its traditional menu and welcoming atmosphere. The restaurant offers classic Greek dishes such as moussaka, seafood, and lamb, complemented by a selection of global wines. Highly recommended by locals, Asteras is celebrated for its exceptional hospitality and top-tier service. Guests can expect simple yet delicious Cretan dishes made with fresh ingredients that speak for themselves.
name: Asteras
address: 347 Wesley St, Nanaimo, BC V9R 3A7, Canada

excerpt: Cozy, urban speakeasy providing a chill atmosphere, an imaginative, elevated menu & craft cocktails.
detail_description: Little Jumbo Restaurant and Bar is a cozy urban speakeasy that offers an imaginative menu and craft cocktails. Established in 2013, it was initially hidden from the public, adding to its allure as a difficult-to-find gem in Victoria. The establishment has been at the forefront of cocktail culture, utilizing innovative techniques such as nitrogen-chilled glassware and live smoke infusions.
name: Little Jumbo Restaurant and Bar
address: Down the Hall, 506 Fort St #102, Victoria, BC V8W 1E6, Canada

excerpt: This charming shop for groceries & gifts is known for its grass-topped roof with resident goats.
detail_description: Old Country Market, also known as Goats on Roof, is a charming shop in Coombs that offers groceries and gifts. The market is famous for its grass-topped roof where resident goats can be seen happily posing for photos while chewing away at the sod. This long-standing attraction also features restaurants, ice cream shops, gift stores, a garden center, and fresh produce.
name: Old Country Market - Goats on Roof
address: 2326 Alberni Hwy, Coombs, BC V0R 1M0, Canada
